/afs/crc.nd.edu/x86_64_linux/c/cuda/10.0/bin/nvcc   -g -G  -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/virus-model.dir/main.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/virus-model.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/afs/crc.nd.edu/x86_64_linux/c/cuda/10.0/lib64/stubs  -L/afs/crc.nd.edu/x86_64_linux/c/cuda/10.0/lib64 libsystemLib.a libpugixmlLib.a src_edgeswap/libedgeswapLib.a src_springs/libspringsLib.a libstorageLib.a libbucketLib.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
